item.title: [sir] Collective Brutality
item.description:
Sorcery

Escalate—Discard a card. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it. That player discards that card.

• Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

• Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [sir] Clear Shot
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

item.title: [sir] Choked Estuary
item.description:
Land

As Choked Estuary enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Choked Estuary enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [sir] Certain Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [sir] Call the Bloodline
item.description:
Enchantment

{1}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black Vampire Knight creature token with lifelink. Activate only once each turn.

item.title: [sir] Byway Courier
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

When Byway Courier dies, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [sir] Bygone Bishop
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Flying

Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 3 or less, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [sir] Burn from Within
item.description:
Sorcery

Burn from Within deals X damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it loses indestructible until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [sir] Bruna, the Fading Light
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel Horror

When you cast this spell, you may return target Angel or Human creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flying, vigilance

(Melds with Gisela, the Broken Blade.)

item.title: [sir] Briarbridge Patrol
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Briarbridge Patrol deals damage to one or more creatures, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

At the beginning of each end step, if you sacrificed three or more Clues this turn, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [sir] Brain in a Jar
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Brain in a Jar, then you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Brain in a Jar from your hand without paying its mana cost.

{3}, {T}, Remove X charge counters from Brain in a Jar: Scry X.

item.title: [sir] Bound by Moonsilver
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or transform.

Sacrifice another permanent: Attach Bound by Moonsilver to target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

item.title: [sir] Borrowed Malevolence
item.description:
Instant

Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or both —

• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Borrowed Hostility
item.description:
Instant

Escalate {3} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or both —

• Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

• Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Borrowed Grace
item.description:
Instant

Escalate {1}{W} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or both —

• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Blood Mist
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Bloodmad Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Berserker

Whenever Bloodmad Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Bloodhall Priest
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Cleric

Whenever Bloodhall Priest enters the battlefield or attacks, if you have no cards in hand, Bloodhall Priest deals 2 damage to any target.

Madness {1}{B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Bloodbriar
item.description:
Creature — Plant Elemental

Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbriar.

item.title: [sir] Blessed Alliance
item.description:
Instant

Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Target player gains 4 life.

• Untap up to two target creatures.

• Target opponent sacrifices an attacking creature.

item.title: [sir] Biting Rain
item.description:
Sorcery

All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Bedlam Reveler
item.description:
Creature — Devil Horror

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

Prowess

When Bedlam Reveler enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.

item.title: [sir] Avacyn's Judgment
item.description:
Sorcery

Madness {X}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Avacyn's Judgment deals 2 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. If this spell's madness cost was paid, it deals X damage divided as you choose among those permanents and/or players instead.

item.title: [sir] Assembled Alphas
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Whenever Assembled Alphas blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Assembled Alphas deals 3 damage to that creature and 3 damage to that creature's controller.

item.title: [sir] Apothecary Geist
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

When Apothecary Geist enters the battlefield, if you control another Spirit, you gain 3 life.

item.title: [sir] Anguished Unmaking
item.description:
Instant

Exile target nonland permanent. You lose 3 life.

item.title: [sir] Angelic Purge
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.

Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment.

item.title: [sir] Always Watching
item.description:
Enchantment

Nontoken creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

item.title: [sir] Altered Ego
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter

This spell can't be countered.

You may have Altered Ego enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it enters with X additional +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [sir] Alms of the Vein
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Alchemist's Greeting
item.description:
Sorcery

Alchemist's Greeting deals 4 damage to target creature.

Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Aim High
item.description:
Instant

Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

item.title: [sir] Advanced Stitchwing
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

Flying

{2}{U}, Discard two cards: Return Advanced Stitchwing from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [sir] Abundant Maw
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Leech

Emerge {6}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

When you cast this spell, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

item.title: [sis] Mayor of Avabruck // Howlpack Alpha
item.description: Creature — Human Advisor Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

item.title: [sis] Kruin Outlaw // Terror of Kruin Pass
item.description: Creature — Human Rogue Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

item.title: [sis] Huntmaster of the Fells // Ravager of the Fells
item.description: Creature — Human Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

item.title: [sis] Garruk Relentless // Garruk, the Veil-Cursed
item.description: Legendary Planeswalker — Garruk // Legendary Planeswalker — Garruk

item.title: [sis] Bloodline Keeper // Lord of Lineage
item.description: Creature — Vampire // Creature — Vampire

item.title: [sis] Zealous Conscripts
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Haste

When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [sis] Young Wolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

item.title: [sis] Vessel of Endless Rest
item.description:
Artifact

When Vessel of Endless Rest enters the battlefield, put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [sis] Vampiric Fury
item.description:
Instant

Vampire creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [sis] Unburial Rites
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Travel Preparations
item.description:
Sorcery

Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sis] Traveler's Amulet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sis] Traitorous Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

item.title: [sis] Tragic Slip
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

item.title: [sis] Stromkirk Captain
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Soldier

First strike

Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1 and have first strike.

item.title: [sis] Stitcher's Apprentice
item.description:
Creature — Homunculus

{1}{U}, {T}: Create a 2/2 blue Homunculus creature token, then sacrifice a creature.
